types.name: Normal
types.description: Normal-type moves are balanced and versatile, with no inherent strengths or weaknesses against most types.

types.name: Fire
types.description: Fire-type moves are super effective against Grass, Ice, Bug, and Steel types, making them excellent for offensive strategies.

types.name: Water
types.description: Water-type moves excel against Fire, Ground, and Rock types, offering both offensive and defensive capabilities.

types.name: Electric
types.description: Electric-type moves are highly effective against Water and Flying types, with immunity to paralysis.

types.name: Grass
types.description: Grass-type moves are strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types, but have many weaknesses.

types.name: Ice
types.description: Ice-type moves are devastating against Grass, Ground, Flying, and Dragon types.

types.name: Fighting
types.description: Fighting-type moves are super effective against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel types.

types.name: Poison
types.description: Poison-type moves are effective against Grass and Fairy types, with strong defensive capabilities.

types.name: Ground
types.description: Ground-type moves are powerful against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types.

types.name: Flying
types.description: Flying-type moves are super effective against Grass, Fighting, and Bug types.

types.name: Psychic
types.description: Psychic-type moves are strong against Fighting and Poison types, with high special attack potential.

types.name: Bug
types.description: Bug-type moves are effective against Grass, Psychic, and Dark types.

types.name: Rock
types.description: Rock-type moves are super effective against Fire, Ice, Flying, and Bug types.

types.name: Ghost
types.description: Ghost-type moves are powerful against Psychic and other Ghost types, with immunity to Normal and Fighting.

types.name: Dragon
types.description: Dragon-type moves are super effective against other Dragon types, known for high stats.

types.name: Dark
types.description: Dark-type moves are effective against Psychic and Ghost types, with immunity to Psychic moves.

types.name: Steel
types.description: Steel-type moves are super effective against Ice, Rock, and Fairy types, with excellent defensive typing.

types.name: Fairy
types.description: Fairy-type moves are strong against Fighting, Dragon, and Dark types, with immunity to Dragon moves.
